column2: The system accurately recognized my emotional state.
column3: The system’s audio and video adaptations felt empathetic toward my mood/emotion.
column4: The changes in audio and visuals seemed tailored to me personally.
column5: I felt highly immersed in the experience when the system adapted to my emotions.
column6: The system’s adaptive media positively affected (boosted or alleviated) my emotional state.
column7: The iterative feedback process led to improvements in the system’s output over time.
column8: I felt that my feedback and changing emotional input genuinely influenced the final media output.
column9: Overall, I enjoyed using this adaptive system and found it satisfying.
column10: The system’s generated media felt fresh, creative, or novel compared to typical experiences.
column11: I would prefer a system that adapts to my emotions over one that does not.
